Class Planet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Star
      • Planet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Body
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Belt, Moon
    public class Planet
extends Star

    • Constructor Detail

      • Planet

        public Planet​(double distance,
              double angle,
              double diameter,
              double speed,
              java.lang.String colour)
        Planet Constructor method. Create a Planet. Must be drawn via the Draw method to be rendered.
        Parameters:
        distance - Double value of the distance between the planet and the star.
        angle - Double value of the angle offset in the polar coordinate system.
        diameter - Double value of the diameter of this planet.
        speed - Double value of the incremental speed of the planet's orbit.
        colour - String value of the color this planet is to be.

    • Method Detail

      • incrementAngle

        public void incrementAngle()
        Increments angle by the preset speed of the object. NOT to be used outside this object by outer scope - as automatic incrementation takes place within the Draw method.

      • Draw

        public void Draw​(SolarSystem solSys)
        Draw method for Planet objects. Automatically increments the angle after rendering.
        Specified by:
        Draw in interface Body
        Overrides:
        Draw in class Star
        Parameters:
        solSys - Target SolarSystem object on which to draw the object to.

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        Getter method of the angle of the planet in pixels.
        Returns:
        Double value of Planet object's angle.

      • setAngle

        public void setAngle​(double angle)
        Setter method of the angle of the planet in the polar coordinates.
        Parameters:
        angle - Double value of the angle of which to set the planet to.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Getter method of the distance of the planet to the parent star in pixels.
        Returns:
        Double value of planet object's distance.

      • setDistance

        public void setDistance​(double distance)
        Setter method of the distance of the planet to the parent star in pixels.
        Parameters:
        distance - Double value of which to set the planet distance to.
